dcterms:creator: Felipe Codevilla
Matthias Müller
Antonio M. López
Vladlen Koltun
Alexey Dosovitskiy
dcterms:description: A high-fidelity autonomous driving simulator that allows for the adjustment of various environmental factors, such as the positions and behaviors of other agents, the layout of roads, and the presence of obstacles.
dcterms:title: CARLA Simulator

dcterms:description: A dataset collected from a human driver operating a steering wheel and pedal to drive the ego car in simulation through a four-way intersection.
dcterms:title: Expert Dataset (from human driver)

dcterms:description: A dataset generated from the built-in autopilot of the CARLA simulator, used to evaluate imitation learning models.
dcterms:title: Expert Dataset (from CARLA built-in autopilot)

dcterms:description: A set of formal specifications used to guide the data aggregation process in imitation learning, focusing on avoiding collisions, not halting, and not abruptly braking.
dcterms:title: STL Properties (Avoid collisions, Do not halt, Do not abruptly brake)
